raw_text: A crucial difference from similar approaches, such as SRL with PropBank roles (Pradhan et al, 2004) is that by identifying relations as part of a frame, you have identified a gestalt of relations that enables far more inference, and sentences from the same passage that use other words from the same frame will be easier to link together
